content: this legal text is about a case in the municipal court of vinkovci involving a coownership of a real estate property the applicant žd owns 910 of the property while the counterparty kd owns 110 the court has decided to dissolve the coownership and transfer the property fully to the applicant the applicant is required to pay the counterparty a compensation of 328393 euros within 15 days the applicant will then submit an application to the land registry department for the transfer of ownership rights the court based its decision on the property act and examined the land registry extract and expert opinions to determine the market value of the property the expert determined the total market value to be 6900000 euros with the counterpartys share being 690000 euros and the applicants share being 6210000 euros the applicant raised objections to the experts findings but the expert confirmed their assessment in response to the petitioners request the court ordered a new expert assessment in september 2023 the new expert found the property to be worth 3283929 euros including the shares of both parties the court accepted this expert opinion and determined that the property belongs entirely to the applicant the opposing party is entitled to receive 328393 euros based on their coownership share the court found that the conditions specified in the property act were fulfilled and made the decision accordingly the decision on costs was omitted as per the petitioners request
